description.gold-silver:
A move that lowers
the foe's SPEED.
description.crystal:
A move that lowers
the foe's SPEED.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Binds the foe with string
to reduce its SPEED.

Binds the foe with string
to reduce its SPEED.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is bound
with strings shot
from the mouth to
reduce its SPEED.

silk blown from the
user’s mouth.
It reduces the
target’s Speed stat.
